item.title: Browser Help?
item.dc:creator: @jvwarrior jvwarrior
item.description:
@jvwarrior wrote:

program Browser;
var
  frmDesign : TForm;
  Label1 : TLabel;
  Label2 : TLabel;
  Label3 : TLabel;
  WebName : TEdit;
  WebCap : TComboBox;
  Other : TEdit;
  Go : TButton;
  WebName0, Other0, WebCap0: String;

procedure SetupAll;
begin
  WebName0 := WebName.Text;
  WebCap0 := WebCap.Text;
  Other0 := Other.Text;
end;

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
SetUpAll;
Openwebpage ('http://www.'+WebName0+'.'+WebCap0+'/'+Other0);
WriteLn ('Opening: http://www.'+WebName0+'.'+WebCap0+'/'+Other0);
end;


procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 497;
frmDesign.Top := 45;
frmDesign.BorderStyle := bsSingle;
frmDesign.Caption := 'Browser';
frmDesign.ClientHeight := 30;
frmDesign.ClientWidth := 560;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := 'MS Sans Serif';
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 5;
Label1.Top := 10;
Label1.Width := 58;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := 'http://www.';
Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label2.Parent := frmDesign;
Label2.Left := 224;
Label2.Top := 10;
Label2.Width := 10;
Label2.Height := 13;
Label2.Caption := '.';
Label3 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label3.Parent := frmDesign;
Label3.Left := 377;
Label3.Top := 10;
Label3.Width := 5;
Label3.Height := 13;
Label3.Caption := '/';
WebName := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
WebName.Parent := frmDesign;
WebName.Left := 65;
WebName.Top := 5;
WebName.Width := 156;
WebName.Height := 21;
WebName.TabOrder := 1;
WebCap := TComboBox.Create(frmDesign);
WebCap.Parent := frmDesign;
WebCap.Left := 230;
WebCap.Top := 5;
WebCap.Width := 145;
WebCap.Height := 21;
WebCap.ItemHeight := 13;
WebCap.TabOrder := 12;
WebCap.Text := '';
WebCap.Items.Add('com');
WebCap.Items.Add('org');
WebCap.Items.Add('net');
WebCap.Items.Add('tk');
Other := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Other.Parent := frmDesign;
Other.Left := 385;
Other.Top := 5;
Other.Width := 85;
Other.Height := 21;
Other.TabOrder := 13;
Go := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Go.Parent := frmDesign;
Go.OnClick := @ButtonClick;
Go.Left := 478;
Go.Top := 4;
Go.Width := 75;
Go.Height := 25;
Go.Caption := 'Go!';
Go.TabOrder := 14;
end;
procedure SafeInitForm;
var
  v: TVariantArray;
begin
  setarraylength(V, 0);
  ThreadSafeCall('InitForm', v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
  frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
  v: TVariantArray;
begin
  setarraylength(V, 0);
  ThreadSafeCall('ShowFormModal', v);
end;

begin
  SafeInitForm;
  SafeShowFormModal;
  FreeForm(frmDesign);
end.

Seems to work pretty fine to me

Read full topic

item.title: Browser Help?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

xD;
Yea, Unless you put it before the Freeform it would give some runtime error because the form will be free’d and all xP
That would work though;

[code]program Browser;
var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Label2 : TLabel;
Label3 : TLabel;
WebName : TEdit;
WebCap : TComboBox;
Other : TEdit;
Go : TButton;
WebName0, Other0, WebCap0: String;

procedure SetupAll;
begin
WebName0 := WebName.Text;
WebCap0 := WebCap.Text;
Other0 := Other.Text;
end; //Moved up to avoid unknown Identifier error

procedure ButtonClick;
begin
SetUpAll; //Puts edit box values to strings
Openwebpage (‘http://www.’+WebName0+’.’+WebCap0+’/’+Other0);
WriteLn (‘Opening: http://www.’+WebName0+’.’+WebCap0+’/’+Other0);
end;

procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 497;
frmDesign.Top := 45;
frmDesign.BorderStyle := bsSingle;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘Browser’;
frmDesign.ClientHeight := 30;
frmDesign.ClientWidth := 560;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 5;
Label1.Top := 10;
Label1.Width := 58;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := ‘http://www.’;
Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label2.Parent := frmDesign;
Label2.Left := 224;
Label2.Top := 10;
Label2.Width := 10;
Label2.Height := 13;
Label2.Caption := ‘.’;
Label3 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label3.Parent := frmDesign;
Label3.Left := 377;
Label3.Top := 10;
Label3.Width := 5;
Label3.Height := 13;
Label3.Caption := ‘/’;
WebName := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
WebName.Parent := frmDesign;
WebName.Left := 65;
WebName.Top := 5;
WebName.Width := 156;
WebName.Height := 21;
WebName.TabOrder := 1;
WebCap := TComboBox.Create(frmDesign);
WebCap.Parent := frmDesign;
WebCap.Left := 230;
WebCap.Top := 5;
WebCap.Width := 145;
WebCap.Height := 21;
WebCap.ItemHeight := 13;
WebCap.TabOrder := 12;
WebCap.Text := ‘’;
WebCap.Items.Add(‘com’);
WebCap.Items.Add(‘org’);
WebCap.Items.Add(‘net’);
WebCap.Items.Add(‘tk’);
Other := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Other.Parent := frmDesign;
Other.Left := 385;
Other.Top := 5;
Other.Width := 85;
Other.Height := 21;
Other.TabOrder := 13;
Go := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Go.Parent := frmDesign;
Go.ModalResult := mrOk;
Go.Left := 478;
Go.Top := 4;
Go.Width := 75;
Go.Height := 25;
Go.Caption := ‘Go!’;
Go.TabOrder := 14;
end;
procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
ButtonClick;
FreeForm(frmDesign);
end.[/code]

item.title: Browser Help?
item.dc:creator: @Scartastic Scartastic
item.description:
@Scartastic wrote:

[quote=“Nashi, post:5, topic:156464”][quote author=sonny bill 9 link=topic=213468.msg1864018#msg1864018 date=1194108517]
Wow thats a great idea i never thought of that… let me see whats wrong
EDIT:Sorry cant see whats wrong wait till Nashis on
[/quote]I lol’d when I read that

It’s because you never called SetUpAll,
Therefore the values of the Text boxes couldn’t be transfered into the Strings

Try this; I commented what I did

[code]program Browser;
var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Label2 : TLabel;
Label3 : TLabel;
WebName : TEdit;
WebCap : TComboBox;
Other : TEdit;
Go : TButton;
WebName0, Other0, WebCap0: String;

procedure SetupAll;
begin
WebName0 := WebName.Text;
WebCap0 := WebCap.Text;
Other0 := Other.Text;
end; //Moved up to avoid unknown Identifier error

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
SetUpAll; //Puts edit box values to strings
Openwebpage (‘http://www.’+WebName0+’.’+WebCap0+’/’+Other0);
WriteLn (‘Opening: http://www.’+WebName0+’.’+WebCap0+’/’+Other0);
end;

procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 497;
frmDesign.Top := 45;
frmDesign.BorderStyle := bsSingle;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘Browser’;
frmDesign.ClientHeight := 30;
frmDesign.ClientWidth := 560;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 5;
Label1.Top := 10;
Label1.Width := 58;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := ‘http://www.’;
Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label2.Parent := frmDesign;
Label2.Left := 224;
Label2.Top := 10;
Label2.Width := 10;
Label2.Height := 13;
Label2.Caption := ‘.’;
Label3 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label3.Parent := frmDesign;
Label3.Left := 377;
Label3.Top := 10;
Label3.Width := 5;
Label3.Height := 13;
Label3.Caption := ‘/’;
WebName := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
WebName.Parent := frmDesign;
WebName.Left := 65;
WebName.Top := 5;
WebName.Width := 156;
WebName.Height := 21;
WebName.TabOrder := 1;
WebCap := TComboBox.Create(frmDesign);
WebCap.Parent := frmDesign;
WebCap.Left := 230;
WebCap.Top := 5;
WebCap.Width := 145;
WebCap.Height := 21;
WebCap.ItemHeight := 13;
WebCap.TabOrder := 12;
WebCap.Text := ‘’;
WebCap.Items.Add(‘com’);
WebCap.Items.Add(‘org’);
WebCap.Items.Add(‘net’);
WebCap.Items.Add(‘tk’);
Other := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Other.Parent := frmDesign;
Other.Left := 385;
Other.Top := 5;
Other.Width := 85;
Other.Height := 21;
Other.TabOrder := 13;
Go := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Go.Parent := frmDesign;
Go.OnClick := @ButtonClick;
Go.Left := 478;
Go.Top := 4;
Go.Width := 75;
Go.Height := 25;
Go.Caption := ‘Go!’;
Go.TabOrder := 14;
end;
procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
FreeForm(frmDesign);
end.[/code]

Also, It’s a pretty nifty idea for a script =][/quote]

!!11!!1one!!!111six!1!11 THANKS

item.title: Browser Help?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

[quote=“sonny bill 9, post:2, topic:156464”]Wow thats a great idea i never thought of that… let me see whats wrong
EDIT:Sorry cant see whats wrong wait till Nashis on ;)[/quote]I lol’d when I read that

It’s because you never called SetUpAll,
Therefore the values of the Text boxes couldn’t be transfered into the Strings

Try this; I commented what I did

[code]program Browser;
var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Label2 : TLabel;
Label3 : TLabel;
WebName : TEdit;
WebCap : TComboBox;
Other : TEdit;
Go : TButton;
WebName0, Other0, WebCap0: String;

procedure SetupAll;
begin
WebName0 := WebName.Text;
WebCap0 := WebCap.Text;
Other0 := Other.Text;
end; //Moved up to avoid unknown Identifier error

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
SetUpAll; //Puts edit box values to strings
Openwebpage (‘http://www.’+WebName0+’.’+WebCap0+’/’+Other0);
WriteLn (‘Opening: http://www.’+WebName0+’.’+WebCap0+’/’+Other0);
end;

procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 497;
frmDesign.Top := 45;
frmDesign.BorderStyle := bsSingle;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘Browser’;
frmDesign.ClientHeight := 30;
frmDesign.ClientWidth := 560;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 5;
Label1.Top := 10;
Label1.Width := 58;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := ‘http://www.’;
Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label2.Parent := frmDesign;
Label2.Left := 224;
Label2.Top := 10;
Label2.Width := 10;
Label2.Height := 13;
Label2.Caption := ‘.’;
Label3 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label3.Parent := frmDesign;
Label3.Left := 377;
Label3.Top := 10;
Label3.Width := 5;
Label3.Height := 13;
Label3.Caption := ‘/’;
WebName := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
WebName.Parent := frmDesign;
WebName.Left := 65;
WebName.Top := 5;
WebName.Width := 156;
WebName.Height := 21;
WebName.TabOrder := 1;
WebCap := TComboBox.Create(frmDesign);
WebCap.Parent := frmDesign;
WebCap.Left := 230;
WebCap.Top := 5;
WebCap.Width := 145;
WebCap.Height := 21;
WebCap.ItemHeight := 13;
WebCap.TabOrder := 12;
WebCap.Text := ‘’;
WebCap.Items.Add(‘com’);
WebCap.Items.Add(‘org’);
WebCap.Items.Add(‘net’);
WebCap.Items.Add(‘tk’);
Other := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Other.Parent := frmDesign;
Other.Left := 385;
Other.Top := 5;
Other.Width := 85;
Other.Height := 21;
Other.TabOrder := 13;
Go := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Go.Parent := frmDesign;
Go.OnClick := @ButtonClick;
Go.Left := 478;
Go.Top := 4;
Go.Width := 75;
Go.Height := 25;
Go.Caption := ‘Go!’;
Go.TabOrder := 14;
end;
procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
FreeForm(frmDesign);
end.[/code]

Also, It’s a pretty nifty idea for a script =]

var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
Openwebpage (‘http://www.’+WebName0+’.’+WebCap0+’/’+Other0);
